page.title: 12The Sports Centre. M Harris
page.content: Just about everyone goes to the{Sports {Centre.}There are lots of things to do there.When I go there mostly on a Saturday, I play{five-a-side football with my friends, but first you have to book a court to play.Whoever wants to play with you, everybody has to put a bit of money towards the court. For the older people they could{play bowls on the green on the inside.The idea of the game is to get your bowls nearest to the white ball which is called the Jack. The one who does is the winner. The idea of the game in{basketball is for one team to pass the ball to each other going down the hall and when one of the players has got a chance they jump up and try to put the ball in the net, and the team with the most points are the winners.
